data.title: American Genre Film Archive POULTRYGEIST: NIGHT OF THE CHICKEN DEAD
data.text:
“As savage as DAWN OF THE DEAD, as slapstick nutzoid as EVIL DEAD 2… an exploitation movie with soul.” - Entertainment Weekly

When the American Chicken Bunker, a military themed fast food restaurant, builds its latest chain restaurant on the site of an ancient Native American burial ground, the displaced spirits take revenge on unsuspecting diners and transform them into chicken zombies! Now, it’s up to a dimwitted counter boy, his ex-girlfriend and a fry cook to put an end to the foul feathered menace once and for all.

This deep-fried smorgasbord of fine-feathered frights is now available!
